titles.title: To amend House Rules to require the random drug testing of officers and employees of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/2/1996--Introduced. Amends rule I of the Rules of the House of Representatives to include as a duty of the Speaker to devise and implement, through an appropriate House entity, a system for the random drug testing of House officers and employees.
